Points of instruction for the ignorant as also, an expositition on the ten commandements, and the Lords Prayer, by questions and answeres. With an examination before our comming to the Lords table. And a short direction for spending of time well. By Robert Horne. Horne, Robert, 1565-1640. Horne, Robert, 1565-1640. aut
The second edition much enlarged.
[80] p.
Printed by George Purslowe for Francis Burton, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the signe of the Greene Dragon, London : 1617.
Reprints part 2 of Horne's "Life and death" (STC 13822.5) with additions--Cf. STC. Signatures: A-E. Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
=======
